text: Praise Fowowe is a Nigerian speaker, author, sex educator and child abuse activist. He is the founder of Centre for Sex Education and Family Life. As the Principal consultant of Praise Fowowe International as well as the founder of The institute of Family Engineering & Development Africa, Praise is an acclaimed internationally family life strategist and crisis manager. He is a world class thinker, futurist and Africa's premier creator and trainer of Family Systems Engineerig. == Education == == References == Category:21st- century Nigerian writers Category:Living people Category:Nigerian activists Category:21st-century Nigerian educators Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Praise Fowowe
